history.proof: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0. induction H0. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: rec_empty, rec_consi. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3use: rec_empty, rec_consi. - sauto depth: 3use: rec_empty, rec_consi.

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0.
intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment pl1 : prec_list H : pl_compat prec_empty pl1 d : preDTA Unable to unify "liste_reconnait ?M1859 prec_empty tnil" with "liste_reconnait d (union_pl prec_empty pl1) tnil".

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros d pl0 pl1 tl H H0. intros H1 H2. induction H0. - apply rec_empty. - simpl. destruct H1 as [H1 | H1]. + inversion H. + destruct H as [H3 H4]. apply rec_consi. * apply H3. * apply IHex. { apply H4. } { apply H1. }
